thread.title: Kristy
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Kristy

author: Kristy
title: Kristy
text: My mother broke an onyx lamp many years ago and saved the salvageable pieces; however, she was unable to get just a base from the product manufacturer (they wanted her to buy a whole new lamp, which she did, but she loved the colors of the one that broke). For years, I have searched antique and other variety stores for a replacement base and always came up empty handed. At Antique Lamp Supply, I not only found a replacement, but I had multiple options. She is going to be so excited this Mother's Day. I highly recommend this site for anyone hoping to find a unique replacement part for their lamp.
